absolute.description: Applies position: absolute to the component.
absolute.description_zh: 将 position： absolute 应用于组件。

border.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be xs, sm, md, lg, xl.
border.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 xs、sm、md、lg、xl。

close-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before closing component. Only applies to hover and focus events.
close-delay.description_zh: 关闭组件之前等待的毫秒数。仅适用于悬停和焦点事件。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用工具颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

disable-resize-watcher.description: Prevents the automatic opening or closing of the drawer when resized, based on whether the device is mobile or desktop.
disable-resize-watcher.description_zh: 防止在调整大小时根据设备是移动设备还是桌面设备自动打开或关闭抽屉。

disable-route-watcher.description: Disables opening of navigation drawer when route changes.
disable-route-watcher.description_zh: 禁用在路线更改时打开抽屉式导航栏。

elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 0 到 24 之间的高程。您可以在海拔页面上找到更多信息。

expand-on-hover.description: Collapses the drawer to a mini-variant until hovering with the mouse.
expand-on-hover.description_zh: 将抽屉折叠为迷你变体，直到将鼠标悬停在鼠标上。

floating.description: A floating drawer has no visible container (no border-right).
floating.description_zh: 浮动抽屉没有可见的容器 （没有 border-right）。

image.description: Apply a specific background image to the component.
image.description_zh: 将特定背景图像应用于组件。

location.type: start / end / left / right / top / bottom
location.description: Controls the edge of the screen the drawer is attached to.
location.description_zh: 控制抽屉所连接的屏幕边缘。

mobile.description: Determines the display mode of the component. If true, the component will be displayed in mobile mode. If false, the component will be displayed in desktop mode. If null, will be based on the current mobile-breakpoint
mobile.description_zh: 确定组件的显示模式。如果为 true，则组件将以移动模式显示。如果为 false，则组件将以桌面模式显示。如果为 null，则将基于当前的 mobile-breakpoint

mobile-breakpoint.type: number / xs / sm / md / lg / xl / xxl
mobile-breakpoint.description: Sets the designated mobile breakpoint for the component. This will apply alternate styles for mobile devices such as the temporary prop, or activate the bottom prop when the breakpoint value is met. Setting the value to 0 will disable this functionality.
mobile-breakpoint.description_zh: 为组件设置指定的移动断点。这将为移动设备应用替代样式，例如 temporary prop，或在满足断点值时激活 bottom prop。将值设置为 0 将禁用此功能。

v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v-model 值。如果 component 支持 multiple prop，则默认为空数组。

name.description: Assign a specific name for layout registration.
name.description_zh: 为布局注册分配特定名称。

open-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before opening component. Only applies to hover and focus events.
open-delay.description_zh: 打开组件之前等待的毫秒数。仅适用于悬停和焦点事件。

order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.
order.description_zh: 根据元件的注册顺序调整元件的顺序。

permanent.description: The drawer remains visible regardless of screen size.
permanent.description_zh: 无论屏幕大小如何，抽屉都保持可见。

persistent.description: Clicking outside or pressing esc key will not dismiss the dialog.
persistent.description_zh: 在外部单击或按 esc 键不会关闭对话框。

rail.description: Sets the component width to the rail-width value.
rail.description_zh: 将组件宽度设置为 rail-width 值。

rail-width.description: Sets the width for the component when rail is enabled.
rail-width.description_zh: 设置启用边栏时组件的宽度。

rounded.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be 0, xs, sm, true, lg, xl, pill, circle, and shaped. Find more information on available border radius classes on the Border Radius page.
rounded.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 0、xs、sm、true、lg、xl、pill、circle 和 shaped。在 Border Radius 页面上查找有关可用边界半径类的更多信息。

scrim.description: Determines whether an overlay is used when a temporary drawer is open. Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.
scrim.description_zh: 确定在打开临时抽屉时是否使用叠加。接受 true/false 以启用背景，接受 string 以定义颜色。

sticky.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定根元素上使用的自定义标记。

temporary.description: A temporary drawer sits above its application and uses a scrim (overlay) to darken the background.
temporary.description_zh: 一个临时抽屉位于其应用程序上方，并使用纱幕（覆盖层）使背景变暗。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

tile.description: Removes any applied border-radius from the component.
tile.description_zh: 从组件中删除任何应用的 border-radius。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 组件的模型更改时发出的事件。

events.name: update:rail
events.description: Event that is emitted when the rail model changes.
events.description_zh: 当轨道模型更改时发出的事件。

slots.name: append
slots.description: A slot at the bottom of the drawer.

slots.name: image
slots.description: Used to modify v-img properties when using the src prop.
slots.description_zh: 用于在使用 src 属性时修改 v-img 属性。

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: A slot at the top of the drawer
